title: Risk Rover Logo Design
snippet: Design a logo for a product which will help companies send and collect risk assessment question(s)/questionnaires(s). Name was inspired by Opportunity and Curiosity rovers mapping the undiscovered mark terrain. We want the logo to be both fun and serious at same time,... our application aims to be easy to use and make the users life easier, as it relates to managing many questionnaires.  As it relates to font selection, we are fond of the range rover font.
